name: WackyMoles
description: Wacky Moles is VR casual game like the Whack-A-Mole. The legend of this town continues and more moles from the backyard also get involved inâ€¦. The storyline of this game is that naughty moles often wander in the vegetable field of the backyard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790M CPU @3.60GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1024 MB available space
